name: Latte to Go
description:
This is my submission to the 120th Trijam! In the jam, you are tasked with making a game in 3 hours, excluding time for planning/submitting. As the theme was "Coffee", I have made a serving game where you have to control a coffee machine, and pour an endless amount of drinks!

Note for Colouring:
  • Orange - Unfinished
  • Green - Perfect
  • Red - Overdone
Controls: Up/Down ArrowMoveSpaceFire
